EmailTemplate.subject: Want to work for NCS year round? Become a Brand Ambassador for The Challenge!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG/SEASONAL-ROLES
Please do not reply to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact your local staffing team.
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
How would you fancy working for The Challenge year-round, helping us to promote the NCS programme and our seasonal roles? We're looking for alumni staff who have the skills and availability to work as Brand Ambassadors for our 2016 recruitment!
About the role
Brand Ambassadors will work directly with The Challenge Staffing Team throughout their attraction and recruitment process, taking on appearances at university recruitment fairs, supporting and giving presentations to promote our seasonal roles, and helping us to upload expressions of interest.
We're looking for Brand Ambassadors in all of our regions, so if you have experience in public speaking, marketing or promoting, and want to earn money in your free time then this is the perfect opportunity for you!
Sounds great - what do I need to do?
For more information on the role, please see the full Brand Ambassador job description:
https://staffing.the-challenge.org/assets/NewBrandAmbassadorsJD_(1).pdf
To register your interest, please fill out this survey - we'd like to know as much about your past experiences as possible, so please answer all of the questions as best as you can!
https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/JJ82G9D
What else?
If you have any questions, feel free to contact us on alumni.ncs@the-challenge.org to discuss the role.
We look forward to working with you again soon!
Best wishes,
The Staffing Team The Challenge NCS Programme
